title: WCAS SPANISH 204-0-20 Reading and Writing the Art of Protest
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Second course of a sequence designed to develop writing skills and structures through analysis of socially-committed art. Emphasis on cultural analysis and development of longer essays.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: 203 or 207
Three class meetings a week

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: For more information on the course contact the coordinator Denise Bouras dbouras@northwestern.edu

subject: SPANISH
